title: Virtual Trainer-Enabled Workplace Fitness Self-Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with foundational physical fitness exercises and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: An elective education program for managing occupational stress and promoting health in corporate settings, conducted in a mobile environment outside work hours. Participants are professionals (medical/legal/technical) with a focus on physical activities rather than mathematical thinking

learning_goals: Learners will be able to accurately perform three or more aerobic exercises maintaining a target heart rate (60–80% of maximum) within 8 weeks by observing a virtual trainer’s demonstration.
Learners will be able to perform five or more consecutive repetitions of various strength-training exercises (e.g., squats, planks, push-ups) within 4 weeks using random practice strategies.
Learners will achieve a motivation score of 4.0/5.0 or higher on the SIMS scale measurement at the program’s conclusion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
